review: I love the fire stick in that I can customize it due to the android platform. I installed kodi with some creative measures requiring a bit of cmd know how.The problem I have with the stick is its wireless connectivity. The stick loses connection frequently and buffers often through kodi, Amazon, and HBO go. I have other devices including my roku in the same location that handle the wireless connection much better.I wish I would have went with fire tv instead of the stick invade it had better wireless. Hopefully improved firmware will come soon or perhaps Amazon will offer a new model replacement when it launches the next generation.
